content.rendered:
Ramaiah Officers IAS Academy

We are now closer to you…

Officers IAS Academy now in Namma Bengaluru

Call us : +919319283285

    About Us

    Officers IAS Academy is the only UPSC (Civil Services) coaching institute in India that is founded and run by a team of former Civil Servants (5 IAS, and 1 IRS) to teach and mentor UPSC aspirants, in the process nurture and create the next generation of Civil Servants. Our endeavor is to emulate the Gurukul System, where the students are trained by the ‘Gurus’, to achieve what the ‘Gurus’ have themselves achieved.

    What started as a small classroom in Chennai with just 7 students, today, has students from all across the country, right from Kashmir to Kanyakumari. To further expand our reach, we are starting a branch in Bengaluru, in partnership with the prestigious Ramaiah University, as “Ramaiah Officers IAS Academy.” Our partner in this endeavor, Ramaiah University, has in its past 55 years, promoted over 20 institutions of academic excellence across the spectrum of applied sciences. They strive to produce graduates who are confident, creative and can apply their academic learning and practical skills to find innovative solutions to problems faced by the Society.

    “Ramaiah Officers IAS Academy”, though located in the Ramaiah University campus, will be open to all IAS/UPSC aspirants across Karnataka and the neighboring states. It will be same faculty of Officers IAS Academy, Chennai, who will teach in the Bengaluru branch.

    It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. 

    Infrastructure

    Course Design

    SCHEDULE for 2022 - 2023
    Term 1 Basics of all subjects (NCERT)
    Term 2 General Studies - Mains and Prelims + Optional + CSAT
    Term 3 Prelims – Revision and Test Series
    STAGE 1 UPSC PRELIMS EXAM - JUNE 2023
    Term 4 June 2023 – September 2023 Mains – Revision and Test Series
    STAGE 2 UPSC MAINS EXAM - SEPTEMBER 2023
    Term 5 November 2023 – March 2024 Interview Module, with Mock Interview
    STAGE 3 UPSC INTERVIEW - MARCH 2024

    Choice of Batches

    BATCHES FREQUENCY GS TIMINGS OPTIONAL TIMINGS Remarks
    DATE Morning Early Morning Evening Weekend
    (Mon-Fri) (Mon-Fri) (Mon-Fri) (Sat&Sun)
    CHENNAI CAMPUS
    * June Batches for 2023 CSE
    Regular Morning All 7 days 06-06-2022 09:00 AM - 11:30 AM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
    * July Batches for 2023 CSE
    Early Morning All 7 days 04-07-2022 06:30 AM - 09:00 AM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
    Regular Morning All 7 days 07-07-2022 08:00 AM - 10:30 AM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
    Evening All 7 days 18-07-2022 05:00 PM - 07:30 PM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
    * August Batches for 2023 CSE
    Regular Morning All 7 days 08-08-2022 09:30 AM - 12:00 PM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
    * September Batches for 2023 CSE
    Regular Morning All 7 days 14-09-2022 10:00 AM - 04:00 PM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
    * November Batches for 2023 CSE
    Regular Morning All 7 days 01-11-2022 01:00 PM - 07:00 PM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON UPCOMING
    Optionals Anthropology | Economics | English Literature | Geography | History | Law | Mathematics | Medical Science | Political Science And International Relations | Psychology | Public Administration | Sociology | Tamil Literature Ongoing
    BENGALURU CAMPUS
    Evening All 7 days 01-08-2022 05:00 PM - 07:30 PM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
    ONLINE
    Online All 7 days 25-07-2022 As per Convenience (Live 4:00PM - 6:30PM) Ongoing

    Packages

    COURSE FEE Discount Net Fee for Combined Package
    Offline
    1 Full Course - General Studies (Prelims + Mains) + CSAT + Optional + Mock Interview ₹ 1,85,000 ₹ 15,000 ₹ 1,70,000
    2 PCM + Optional - General Studies (Prelims + Mains) + Optional + Mock Interview ₹ 1,65,000 ₹ 7,000 ₹ 1,58,000
    3 PCM + CSAT - General Studies (Prelims + Mains) + CSAT + Mock Interview ₹ 1,55,000 ₹ 7,000 ₹ 1,48,000
    4 PCM - General Studies (Prelims + Mains) only + Mock Interview ₹ 1,35,000 ₹ 5,000 ₹ 1,30,000
    5 Only Optional - Duration 5 Months | Choose any 1 from Public Administration I Anthropology I Agriculture I Political Science and International Relations I Geography I History I Law I Sociology I Economics I Psychology I Philosophy I Tamil Literature I Commerce and Accountancy I Geology I English Literature I Mathematics I Medical Science I Engineering. Civil, Mechanical and Electrical I Sanskrit Literature ₹ 30,000 - -
    6 CSAT package for - CSAT only (3 months) ₹ 20,000 - -
    7 2 years Integrated Course (PCM x 1 + Full Course x 1) ₹ 3,00,000 ₹ 40,000 ₹ 2,60,000
    8 3 years Integrated Course (PCM x 2 + Full Course x 1) ₹ 4,00,000 ₹ 50,000 ₹ 3,50,000
    Online
    9 Full Course - General Studies (Prelims + Mains) + CSAT + Optional + Mock Interview ₹ 1,45,000 ₹ 10,000 ₹ 1,35,000
    10 PCM + Optional - General Studies (Prelims + Mains) + Optional + Mock Interview ₹ 1,24,000 ₹ 4,000 ₹ 1,20,000
    11 PCM + CSAT - General Studies (Prelims + Mains) + CSAT + Mock Interview ₹ 1,16,000 ₹ 4,000 ₹ 1,12,000
    12 PCM - General Studies (Prelims + Mains) only + Mock Interview ₹ 1,05,000 ₹ 5,000 ₹ 1,00,000

    Location & Contact Us

    Ramaiah Officers IAS Academy.
    Heritage building, next to school of social sciences MSR College Rd,
    M S Ramaiah Nagar, Mathikere, Bengaluru,
    Karnataka 560054

    For details regarding admissions call :

    +91 9319283285

    +91 7397442266
